 Nightstrike::
Nightstrike was amaced that Epyon kept his word... altought he knew that maximal has a high concept of the honor "As you see she isn't hurted"said Nightstrike"just a little scared... perhaps you thinks that I a mean bot due I forced you to promised my freedom... but always exist a second chance... you might have a second chance to try to capture me... or I could have a second chance to fight with you and take revange for my defeat in IGL...But  I swear you that I won't come back alive  to maximal city for second time...".
Nightstrike followed Skyburst.
  RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote: ::Epyon/Skyburst::

He walked up and picked up Alpha.
"It's ok, Alpha. Your going to be fine."
He saw how scared she was, and wanted to kill Nighstrike. Then he
remembered that their was a Maximal in their. He had to keep his word.
They wouldn't be able to try to bring the Maximal out again, but at
least Alpha was safe.
"Skyburst, show him out."

Skyburst simply started walking, waiting for Nightstrike to follow.
